summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2000 HONDA LX. THE CONTACT WAS TRAVELING 40 MPH WHEN THE SRS WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE DEALER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 153,000 AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 153,052. UPDATED 08/21/12*LJ
